text: Maria de Lourdes Bettencourt de Castro (9 December 1930 – 8 January 2022) was a Portuguese artist. She was known for creating shadow puppets for her Shadow Theatre. She helped create the São Paulo Art Biennial. Castro died at a hospital in Funchal, Portugal from pneumonia on 8 January 2022, at the age of 91. President Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa called her "one of the most [important] Portuguese artists". ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Portuguese artists Category:Infectious disease deaths in Portugal Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:People from Funchal
